'''Captain Darmo''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A tired officer of Port Maje's guard, currently stuck guarding [Rinco](/rinco/), a local merchant, after an altercation with a Huana woman.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* He provides a lead for the [Stranded](/stranded/) quest.
* A Watcher with the Aristocrat background will yield an apology from Darmo after telling him he's being rude.
}}
[Category:Port Maje characters](/categoryPortMajeCharacters/)
[Category:Port Maje Harbor characters](/categoryPortMajeHarborCharacters/)

==Background==
A tired officer of Port Maje's guard, currently stuck guarding [[Rinco]], a local merchant, after an altercation with a Huana woman.
